image_analysis.description: A four-page document displaying a deposition transcript. The pages are numbered 73, 74, 75, and 76. The text is typed and arranged in a two-column format, with timestamps and line numbers on the left and the spoken testimony on the right. The document has headers with page numbers and footers with deposition service information, page counts, a date/time stamp, and a document identifier.
image_analysis.layout: Four-quadrant layout, with each quadrant representing a single page of the transcript (pages 73, 74, 75, 76). Each page has a header, a main body with two columns, and a footer.

document_metadata.subject: Deposition testimony regarding Jeffrey Epstein, Alan Dershowitz, and Virginia Roberts, including discussions of complaints, flight logs, and categories of abusers.

notes: The document is a composite image showing four distinct pages of a deposition transcript. All text appears to be machine-printed and is clearly legible.
